TopicTitle: Murderbot, the little Destroyer who couldn't

Articles.Content:
I decided to take a break from serious gameplay and build a killer robot

Murderbot's first rampage is admittedly less than terrifying.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Perhaps I'll revisit him later and make some improvements...

Cute meets terrifying in a spectacular way. Despite his (or her?) best attempts, it was just too much of a task to handle. Next time the RTGs need to land in Jeb's "MOAR BOOSTERS" pile....

Loved it. Good bit of fun!

Cute meets terrifying in a spectacular way. Despite his (or her?) best attempts, it was just too much of a task to handle. Next time the RTGs need to land in Jeb's "MOAR BOOSTERS" pile....

Loved it. Good bit of fun!

Thank you!

This has been pretty well received everywhere I've posted it.

Anyway, don't worry, I'll come back to Murderbot eventually... and I already have some terrifying modifications in mind. Does a mouth that breathes fiery nuclear exhaust sound good to you?
It almost reminds me of Sinistar, when he was young an inexperienced. So cute and non-threatening... at least, for the moment.
